coding.display: NEISSERIA GONORRHOEAE (GC), NUCLEIC ACID PROBE, WITH AMPLIFICATION

valueString: Negative for Neisseria gonorrhoeae by ___, APTIMA COMBO 2 Assay.  Validated for use on Urine Samples by the ___ Microbiology Laboratory. Performance characteristics on urine samples were found to be equivalent to those of FDA- approved TIGRIS APTIMA COMBO 2 and/or COBAS Amplicor methods.
